simj

Class SimEventScanResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • simj.SimEvent
      • simj.SimEventScanResources

  • public final class SimEventScanResources
extends SimEvent
    This class implements an event, which schedules itself every interval and prints the status (# being served and # waiting) for each resource.
    Author:
    Patrik Fuhrer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimEventScanResources(double pInterval)
      Constructs a SimEventScanResources object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Logs the status of all the resources of the simulation and reschedules itself.
